name: Broken Diceisticks
description:
You play as a blue robot fighting with angry red robots. In order to get a random weapon you need to collect a die which drops from enemies. The less the value of the die the less ammo and more powerful guns you have! (btw, boss doesn't supossed to have so little HP)

Code by Madness

Art by Baicherra

Sounds and music attributions:

Mixkit, Flem0527, sonically_sound, Dubpixel, Rudmer Rotteveel, Jarusca, Abu Nijmeh, Johan Deecke
